page.title: 07MARYC.TOURISM CAMPING SITE
page.content:
There is a small caravan site on the banks of the Dee beside the Old Mill Inn.It holds 75 caravans.Some are residential.It is open to tourers in the summer months.Tents are allowed. There is a small shop and a place where children can play if weather is bad.There are lovely views up and down the River Dee.It is only 6 miles from the city of Aberdeen.Some like to use it as a base for touring Royal Deeside and the castles,of which there are many in Grampian Region.
Nearby,although not on the site is Champer's night club,mostly patronised by people from Aberdeen.
